title: Credit line on UPI could cross $1 trillion in transaction value by 2030: Zeta
description: The credit line on UPI could exceed $1 trillion in transaction value by 2030, according to Zeta. Key drivers include rising credit demand, a shift towards digital payments, and improved credit discovery and utilization. UPI credit lines provide banks with alternative data for better credit assessments, especially in under-served regions.
